phrs.translation: 公开经历；经验的开放性

sentences.sentence: Those who got to know him better warmed to his openness and honesty.
sentences.translation: 那些逐渐了解了他的人对他的率真与坦诚产生了好感。

sentences.sentence: Yet this is a Government which proclaims that it is all in favour of openness.
sentences.translation: 然而这是一个宣称全力支持开放的政府。
